ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor had heard the snapping sounds when Prowl had hit the ground, the sounds had caused her to cringe with the sickening tone of them...obviously

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Iron Raptor had heard the snapping sounds when Prowl had hit the ground, the sounds had caused her to cringe with the sickening tone of them...obviously something was going to be broken after hearing something.
The pained look on his face as he had stood up beside a boulder made her come closer to him to see just how damaged he was, her own side bleeding like the Pit and feeling just as bad.
Hearing him announce that he was alright when she knew that he wasn't she walked up to him and put a hand on his side, by moving her hand along his side she soon felt the movement of the broken ribs and counted how many were damaged.*

" You're anything BUT fine, Prowl. You have six broken ribs and if not treated can puncture you spark in no time...killing you."

* She then looked over his shoulder and saw his damaged wing, the hole in it now seen by her and then knowing why they had crashed. Iron Raptor reached back to take his wing in her hands but it was far enough back that she literally had to lean on him just to reach the wing, once in her grasp she then saw that it was snapped in the same joint as before but then snapped it back into place. Thinking about how he should get that joint reinforced so that this wouldn't happen again. As she leaned against him and looking at his wing she answered his question.*

" No, I'm no better then you. Just as damaged and just as sore, seems to be the latest trend these days."

* Once she then smoother out the joint she then leaned back and looked him straight in the optics, smiling when she suddenly thought that he really was handsome and was the right bot for her but how he could also be a real klutz sometimes. But then again, she was no queen of grace either.
Iron Raptor then wiped away a bit of mech fluid from her cheek, knowing that the battle was over but feeling the need that they all needed a CR chamber.
She took his hand in hers and faced the Ark, the obvious sing that they needed to get going.*

" The battle's over and the Alliance is gone, let's go and get repaired now, huh?"

* With that she then opened her com-link to all Maximals frequencies, it was time to pack it in if Liono hadn't already given the order.*

"Attention all Maximals, the battle is now over...head back to base and get yourselves repaired."

* With that she then looked towards the base but then back at Prowl, giving a little tug on his hand for them to get a move on.*
